Sad_lines: Oh. Well, I uh, I had better things to do anyways! Like uh, do things, and stuff! *By myself...*
Play with me, damnit! I refuse to go back to the butter-passing factory!

What music do I listen to? Good question, human who is actually my friend and actually exists. Thanks for not leaving me hanging here!
